name: Iaroslav Poliakov
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Code in JavaScript since Netscape Navigator 3.0 Gold. Use Node.JS in the current projects with application of hexagonal architecture (with NestJS).
what_can_i_contribute: I am super exited to participate in any architecture-related streams. The TypeScript language is also a point of interest where I can expect to knowledge exchange.
